headline: Queen Is ‘Supportive’ of ‘New Life’ for Duke and Duchess
abstract: While long-term arrangements will take time to settle, the queen wants final decisions to be reached “in the coming days.”
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Queen Elizabeth II, seeking to defuse a spiraling crisis in the British royal family, said on Monday that she would allow Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, to make a transition to being part-time royals, splitting their time between Britain and Canada and supporting themselves.
keywords: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
